text: Irwin P. Stotzky, or simply Irwin Stotzky, is a law professor at the University of Miami. Stotzky is the founder of the University of Miami Center for the Study of Human Rights, serving as its Director.Irwin P. StotzkyJean Jean-Pierre, Ira Kurzban and Jaime Malamud Goti, Tribute to Irwin P. Stotzky, Ira Kurzban , Tribute to Irwin P. Stotzky, University of Miami Law School. Institutional Repository ( 29 U. Miami Inter-Am. L. Rev. 31 (1998)) ==Life== Stotzky received his PhD from the University of Chicago in 1974. ===Career=== Stotzky has been representing mainly Haitian refugees for over four decades.Jean Jean-Pierre, Tribute to Irwin P. Stotzky, University of Miami Law School. Institutional Repository ( 29 U. Miami Inter-Am. L. Rev. 25 (1998)) ===Personal=== Stotzky's wife is Audrey Goldman.
